mapper.select: /* orderDao.selectOrdList - 주문 리스트 */ SELECT BASE.ORD_NO AS ordNo , BASE.ORD_CLM_NO AS ordClmNo , BASE.CLM_SCT_CD AS clmSctCd , BASE.CLM_STAT_CD AS clmStatCd , DTL.ORD_DTL_STAT_CD AS ordDtlStatCd , BASE.ORDR_ID AS ordrId , BASE.ORDR_NM AS ordrNm , BASE.ORDR_PHON AS ordrPhon , BASE.ORDR_EMAIL AS ordrEmail , BASE.ACQR_PHON AS acqrPhon , BASE.ACQR_NM AS acqrNm , BASE.ACQR_ADDR AS acqrAddr , BASE.ACQR_ADDR_DTL AS acqrAddrDtl , BASE.ACQR_EMAIL AS acqrEmail , BASE.PRCL_WAY AS prclWay , BASE.PACK_WAY AS packWay , BASE.PAY_WAY AS payWay , BASE.PAY_MNY AS payMny , BASE.REQ_MEMO AS reqMemo , BASE.ORD_DATE AS ordDate , BASE.UPDT_DATE AS updtDate , BASE.UPDT_ID AS updtId , BASE.RGST_DATE AS rgstDate , BASE.RGST_ID AS rgstId , BASE.BILL_NUM AS billNum , DTL.ORD_CLM_DTL_SN AS ordClmDtlSn , DTL.GOODS_NM AS goodsNm , DTL.GOODS_CD AS goodsCd , DTL.GOODS_QTY AS goodsQty , STD.CODE_NM AS codeNm FROM CLT_ORD_BASE BASE , CLT_ORD_DTL DTL , CLT_STD_CD_BASE STD WHERE 1=1 AND BASE.ORD_CLM_NO = DTL.ORD_CLM_NO AND DTL.ORD_DTL_STAT_CD = STD.CODE_VAL AND STD.GRP_CD = 'STD004' ORDER BY BASE.ORD_NO ASC LIMIT #{startIdx }, #{pagePerRows };

/* cltOrderMapper - selectOrdOne */ SELECT ORD_NO AS ordNo , ORD_CLM_NO AS ordClmNo , CLM_SCT_CD AS clmSctCd , CLM_STAT_CD AS clmStatCd , ORDR_ID AS ordrId , ORDR_NM AS ordrNm , ORDR_PHON AS ordrPhon , ORDR_EMAIL AS ordrEmail , ACQR_PHON AS acqrPhon , ACQR_NM AS acqrNm , ACQR_ADDR AS acqrAddr , ACQR_ADDR_DTL AS acqrAddrDtl , ACQR_EMAIL AS acqrEmail , PRCL_WAY AS prclWay , PACK_WAY AS packWay , PAY_WAY AS payWay , PAY_MNY AS payMny , REQ_MEMO AS reqMemo , ORD_DATE AS ordDate , UPDT_DATE AS updtDate , UPDT_ID AS updtId , RGST_DATE AS rgstDate , RGST_ID AS rgstId , BILL_NUM AS billNum FROM CLT_ORD_BASE OB WHERE 1=1 AND ORD_NO = #{ordNo} AND ORD_CLM_NO = #{ordClmNo}

/* cltOrderMapper - selectOrdHistOne */ SELECT ORD_NO AS ordNo, ORD_CLM_NO AS ordClmNo, ORD_CLM_DTL_SN AS ordClmDtlSn, CLM_SCT_CD AS clmSctCd, CLM_STAT_CD AS clmStatCd, ORD_DTL_STAT_CD AS ordDtlStatCd, PROC_DATE AS procDate, RGST_ID AS rgstId, RGST_DATE AS rgstDate, CLM_RASN AS clmRasn, HIST_MEMO AS histMemo FROM CLT_ORD_HIST WHERE ORD_NO = #{ordNo} AND ORD_CLM_NO = #{ordClmNo} ORDER BY RGST_DATE DESC LIMIT 1;

/* cltOrderMapper - selectOrdDtlOne */ SELECT ORD_CLM_NO AS ordClmNo , ORD_CLM_DTL_SN AS ordClmDtlSn , SND_GOODS_QTY AS sndGoodsQty , RTN_GOODS_QTY AS rtnGoodsQty , GOODS_NM AS goodsNm , GOODS_CD AS goodsCd , GOODS_QTY AS goodsQty , UPDT_DATE AS updtDate , UPDT_ID AS updtId , RGST_DATE AS rgstDate , RGST_ID AS rgstId FROM CLT_ORD_DTL WHERE 1=1 AND ORD_CLM_NO = #{ordClmNo} AND ORD_CLM_DTL_SN = #{ordClmDtlSn}

/* cltOrderMapper - selectOrdClmNoOne */ SELECT DTL.ORD_CLM_NO AS ordClmNo , DTL.GOODS_NM AS goodsNm , DTL.GOODS_CD AS goodsCd , DTL.GOODS_QTY AS goodsQty , DTL.UPDT_DATE AS updtDate , DTL.UPDT_ID AS updtId , DTL.RGST_DATE AS rgstDate , DTL.RGST_ID AS rgstId , SALE.BUL_TIT_NM AS bulTitNm , SALE.GOODS_PRC AS goodsPrc , SALE.GOODS_SALE_PRC AS goodsSalePrc , GOOD.IMG_PATH AS imgPath , GOOD.IMG_NM AS imgNm , GOOD.DLV_PRC AS dlvPrc , BASE.ORD_NO AS ordNo , BASE.PAY_MNY AS payMny FROM CLT_ORD_DTL DTL INNER JOIN CLT_SALE_BOARD SALE ON SALE.GOODS_CD = DTL.GOODS_CD INNER JOIN CLT_GOODS_INFO GOOD ON GOOD.GOODS_CD = DTL.GOODS_CD INNER JOIN CLT_ORD_BASE BASE ON BASE.ORD_CLM_NO = DTL.ORD_CLM_NO WHERE 1=1 AND BASE.ORD_CLM_NO = #{ordClmNo} AND DTL.ORD_CLM_DTL_SN = #{ordClmDtlSn}

/* cltOrderMapper - selectOrdDtlList */ SELECT ORD_CLM_NO AS ordClmNo , ORD_CLM_DTL_SN AS ordClmDtlSn , SND_GOODS_QTY AS sndGoodsQty , RTN_GOODS_QTY AS rtnGoodsQty , GOODS_NM AS goodsNm , GOODS_CD AS goodsCd , GOODS_QTY AS goodsQty , UPDT_DATE AS updtDate , UPDT_ID AS updtId , RGST_DATE AS rgstDate , RGST_ID AS rgstId FROM CLT_ORD_DTL WHERE 1=1

/* cltOrderMapper - ordBasketSelect */ SELECT ORD.SALE_BOARD_SEQ AS saleBoardSeq , SALE.GOODS_PRC AS goodsPrc , SALE.GOODS_SALE_PRC AS goodsSalePrc , GOODS.ENTR_NO AS entrNo , GOODS.GOODS_NM AS goodsNm , GOODS.GOODS_CD AS goodsCd , GOODS.DLV_PRC AS dlvPrc FROM CLT_ORD_BASKET ORD , CLT_SALE_BOARD SALE , CLT_GOODS_INFO GOODS WHERE 1=1 AND ORD.SALE_BOARD_SEQ = SALE.SALE_BOARD_SEQ AND ORD.GOODS_CD = GOODS.GOODS_CD AND ORD.ORD_BASKET_SEQ = ${ordBasketSeq}

/* cltOrderMapper - selectBasketList */ SELECT BSKT.ORD_BASKET_SEQ AS ordBasketSeq , BSKT.USR_ID AS usrId , BSKT.GOODS_QTY AS goodsQty , BSKT.SALE_BOARD_SEQ AS saleBoardSeq /*판매게시판시퀀스*/ , GODS.IMG_PATH AS imgPath /*상품이미지경로*/ , GODS.IMG_NM AS imgNm /*상품이미지이름*/ , SALE.BUL_TIT_NM AS bulTitNm /*제목*/ , SALE.GOODS_CD AS goodsCd /*상품 코드*/ , SALE.ENTR_NO AS entrNo /*거래처 번호*/ , SALE.GOODS_PRC AS goodsPrc /*상품 가격*/ , SALE.GOODS_SALE_PRC AS goodsSalePrc /*상품 할인 가격*/ , SALE.SALE_CNT AS saleCnt /*판매 수량*/ , SALE.SALE_STAT_CD AS saleStatCd /*판매 상태 코드*/ , SALE.DESCRIPTION AS description /*설명*/ FROM CLT_ORD_BASKET BSKT , CLT_GOODS_INFO GODS , CLT_SALE_BOARD SALE WHERE 1=1 AND BSKT.GOODS_CD = GODS.GOODS_CD AND BSKT.SALE_BOARD_SEQ = SALE.SALE_BOARD_SEQ AND BSKT.USE_YN = 'Y' AND BSKT.USR_ID = #{usrId}

/* cltOrderMapper - searchIdOrdList */ SELECT BASE.ORD_NO AS ordNo , BASE.ORD_CLM_NO AS ordClmNo , BASE.CLM_SCT_CD AS clmSctCd , BASE.CLM_STAT_CD AS clmStatCd , DTL.ORD_DTL_STAT_CD AS ordDtlStatCd , BASE.ORDR_ID AS ordrId , BASE.ORDR_NM AS ordrNm , BASE.ORDR_PHON AS ordrPhon , BASE.ORDR_EMAIL AS ordrEmail , BASE.ACQR_PHON AS acqrPhon , BASE.ACQR_NM AS acqrNm , BASE.ACQR_ADDR AS acqrAddr , BASE.ACQR_ADDR_DTL AS acqrAddrDtl , BASE.ACQR_EMAIL AS acqrEmail , BASE.PRCL_WAY AS prclWay , BASE.PACK_WAY AS packWay , BASE.PAY_WAY AS payWay , BASE.PAY_MNY AS payMny , BASE.REQ_MEMO AS reqMemo , BASE.ORD_DATE AS ordDate , BASE.UPDT_DATE AS updtDate , BASE.UPDT_ID AS updtId , BASE.RGST_DATE AS rgstDate , BASE.RGST_ID AS rgstId , BASE.BILL_NUM AS billNum , DTL.ORD_CLM_DTL_SN AS ordClmDtlSn , DTL.GOODS_NM AS goodsNm , DTL.GOODS_CD AS goodsCd , DTL.GOODS_QTY AS goodsQty , STD.CODE_NM AS codeNm FROM CLT_ORD_BASE BASE , CLT_ORD_DTL DTL , CLT_STD_CD_BASE STD WHERE 1=1 AND BASE.USR_ID = DTL.USR_ID AND BASE.ORD_NO = DTL.ORD_NO AND DTL.ORD_DTL_STAT_CD = STD.CODE_VAL AND STD.GRP_CD = 'STD004' AND BASE.ORDR_ID = #{usrId}

/* cltOrderMapper - searchOrdNoList */ SELECT BASE.ORD_NO AS ordNo , BASE.ORD_CLM_NO AS ordClmNo , BASE.CLM_SCT_CD AS clmSctCd , BASE.CLM_STAT_CD AS clmStatCd , DTL.ORD_DTL_STAT_CD AS ordDtlStatCd , BASE.ORDR_ID AS ordrId , BASE.ORDR_NM AS ordrNm , BASE.ORDR_PHON AS ordrPhon , BASE.ORDR_EMAIL AS ordrEmail , BASE.ACQR_PHON AS acqrPhon , BASE.ACQR_NM AS acqrNm , BASE.ACQR_ADDR AS acqrAddr , BASE.ACQR_ADDR_DTL AS acqrAddrDtl , BASE.ACQR_EMAIL AS acqrEmail , BASE.PRCL_WAY AS prclWay , BASE.PACK_WAY AS packWay , BASE.PAY_WAY AS payWay , BASE.PAY_MNY AS payMny , BASE.REQ_MEMO AS reqMemo , BASE.ORD_DATE AS ordDate , BASE.UPDT_DATE AS updtDate , BASE.UPDT_ID AS updtId , BASE.RGST_DATE AS rgstDate , BASE.RGST_ID AS rgstId , BASE.BILL_NUM AS billNum , DTL.ORD_CLM_DTL_SN AS ordClmDtlSn , DTL.GOODS_NM AS goodsNm , DTL.GOODS_CD AS goodsCd , DTL.GOODS_QTY AS goodsQty , STD.CODE_NM AS codeNm , SALERVW.RVW_TAG AS rvwTag , SALERVW.SALE_BOARD_RPY_SEQ AS saleBoardRpySeq , SALE.GOODS_PRC AS goodsPrc , SALE.GOODS_SALE_PRC AS goodsSalePrc , GOOD.IMG_PATH AS imgPath , GOOD.IMG_NM AS imgNm FROM CLT_ORD_BASE BASE INNER JOIN CLT_ORD_DTL DTL ON BASE.ORDR_ID = DTL.RGST_ID AND BASE.ORD_CLM_NO = DTL.ORD_CLM_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_STD_CD_BASE STD ON DTL.ORD_DTL_STAT_CD = STD.CODE_VAL LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_GOODS_INFO GOOD ON GOOD.GOODS_CD = DTL.GOODS_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_SALE_BOARD SALE ON SALE.GOODS_CD = GOOD.GOODS_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_SALE_BOARD_RVW SALERVW ON DTL.ORD_CLM_DTL_SN = SALERVW.ORD_CLM_DTL_SN WHERE 1=1 AND STD.GRP_CD = 'STD004' AND BASE.ORD_NO = #{ordNo} AND BASE.ORD_CLM_NO = #{ordClmNo}

/* cltOrderMapper - searchOrdClmNoList */ SELECT BASE.ORD_NO AS ordNo , BASE.ORD_CLM_NO AS ordClmNo , BASE.CLM_SCT_CD AS clmSctCd , BASE.CLM_STAT_CD AS clmStatCd , DTL.ORD_DTL_STAT_CD AS ordDtlStatCd , BASE.ORDR_ID AS ordrId , BASE.ORDR_NM AS ordrNm , BASE.ORDR_PHON AS ordrPhon , BASE.ORDR_EMAIL AS ordrEmail , BASE.ACQR_PHON AS acqrPhon , BASE.ACQR_NM AS acqrNm , BASE.ACQR_ADDR AS acqrAddr , BASE.ACQR_ADDR_DTL AS acqrAddrDtl , BASE.ACQR_EMAIL AS acqrEmail , BASE.PRCL_WAY AS prclWay , BASE.PACK_WAY AS packWay , BASE.PAY_WAY AS payWay , BASE.PAY_MNY AS payMny , BASE.REQ_MEMO AS reqMemo , BASE.ORD_DATE AS ordDate , BASE.UPDT_DATE AS updtDate , BASE.UPDT_ID AS updtId , BASE.RGST_DATE AS rgstDate , BASE.RGST_ID AS rgstId , BASE.BILL_NUM AS billNum , DTL.ORD_CLM_DTL_SN AS ordClmDtlSn , DTL.GOODS_NM AS goodsNm , DTL.GOODS_CD AS goodsCd , DTL.GOODS_QTY AS goodsQty , STD.CODE_NM AS codeNm , SALERVW.RVW_TAG AS rvwTag , SALERVW.SALE_BOARD_RPY_SEQ AS saleBoardRpySeq , SALE.GOODS_PRC AS goodsPrc , SALE.GOODS_SALE_PRC AS goodsSalePrc , GOOD.IMG_PATH AS imgPath , GOOD.IMG_NM AS imgNm FROM CLT_ORD_BASE BASE INNER JOIN CLT_ORD_DTL DTL ON BASE.ORDR_ID = DTL.RGST_ID AND BASE.ORD_CLM_NO = DTL.ORD_CLM_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_STD_CD_BASE STD ON DTL.ORD_DTL_STAT_CD = STD.CODE_VAL LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_GOODS_INFO GOOD ON GOOD.GOODS_CD = DTL.GOODS_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_SALE_BOARD SALE ON SALE.GOODS_CD = GOOD.GOODS_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_SALE_BOARD_RVW SALERVW ON DTL.ORD_CLM_DTL_SN = SALERVW.ORD_CLM_DTL_SN WHERE 1=1 AND STD.GRP_CD = 'STD004' AND BASE.ORD_CLM_NO = #{ordClmNo}

/* cltOrderMapper - searchOrdNoOne */ SELECT BASE.ORD_NO AS ordNo , BASE.ORD_CLM_NO AS ordClmNo , BASE.CLM_SCT_CD AS clmSctCd , BASE.CLM_STAT_CD AS clmStatCd , DTL.ORD_DTL_STAT_CD AS ordDtlStatCd , BASE.ORDR_ID AS ordrId , BASE.ORDR_NM AS ordrNm , BASE.ORDR_PHON AS ordrPhon , BASE.ORDR_EMAIL AS ordrEmail , BASE.ACQR_PHON AS acqrPhon , BASE.ACQR_NM AS acqrNm , BASE.ACQR_ADDR AS acqrAddr , BASE.ACQR_ADDR_DTL AS acqrAddrDtl , BASE.ACQR_EMAIL AS acqrEmail , BASE.PRCL_WAY AS prclWay , BASE.PACK_WAY AS packWay , BASE.PAY_WAY AS payWay , BASE.PAY_MNY AS payMny , BASE.REQ_MEMO AS reqMemo , BASE.ORD_DATE AS ordDate , BASE.UPDT_DATE AS updtDate , BASE.UPDT_ID AS updtId , BASE.RGST_DATE AS rgstDate , BASE.RGST_ID AS rgstId , BASE.BILL_NUM AS billNum , DTL.ORD_CLM_DTL_SN AS ordClmDtlSn , DTL.GOODS_NM AS goodsNm , DTL.GOODS_CD AS goodsCd , DTL.GOODS_QTY AS goodsQty , STD.CODE_NM AS codeNm , SALERVW.RVW_TAG AS rvwTag FROM CLT_ORD_BASE BASE INNER JOIN CLT_ORD_DTL DTL ON BASE.ORDR_ID = DTL.RGST_ID AND BASE.ORD_CLM_NO = DTL.ORD_CLM_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_STD_CD_BASE STD ON DTL.ORD_DTL_STAT_CD = STD.CODE_VAL LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_SALE_BOARD_RVW SALERVW ON BASE.ORD_NO = SALERVW.ORD_NO WHERE 1=1 AND STD.GRP_CD = 'STD004' AND BASE.ORD_CLM_NO = #{ordClmNo}

/* cltOrderMapper - mypgOrdDtl */ SELECT BASE.ORD_NO AS ordNo , BASE.ORD_CLM_NO AS ordClmNo , BASE.CLM_SCT_CD AS clmSctCd , BASE.CLM_STAT_CD AS clmStatCd , BASE.ORDR_ID AS ordrId , BASE.ORDR_NM AS ordrNm , BASE.ORDR_PHON AS ordrPhon , BASE.ORDR_EMAIL AS ordrEmail , BASE.ACQR_PHON AS acqrPhon , BASE.ACQR_NM AS acqrNm , BASE.ACQR_ADDR AS acqrAddr , BASE.ACQR_ADDR_DTL AS acqrAddrDtl , BASE.ACQR_EMAIL AS acqrEmail , BASE.PRCL_WAY AS prclWay , BASE.PACK_WAY AS packWay , BASE.PAY_WAY AS payWay , BASE.PAY_MNY AS payMny , BASE.REQ_MEMO AS reqMemo , BASE.ORD_DATE AS ordDate , BASE.UPDT_DATE AS updtDate , BASE.UPDT_ID AS updtId , BASE.RGST_DATE AS rgstDate , BASE.RGST_ID AS rgstId , BASE.BILL_NUM AS billNum , DTL.ORD_CLM_DTL_SN AS ordClmDtlSn , DTL.GOODS_NM AS goodsNm , DTL.GOODS_CD AS goodsCd , DTL.GOODS_QTY AS goodsQty , DTL.ORD_DTL_STAT_CD AS ordDtlStatCd , STD.CODE_NM AS codeNm , SALE.BUL_TIT_NM AS bulTitNm , SALE.GOODS_PRC AS goodsPrc , SALE.GOODS_SALE_PRC AS goodsSalePrc , GOOD.DLV_PRC AS dlvPrc , GOOD.IMG_PATH AS imgPath , GOOD.IMG_NM AS imgNm , RVW.SALE_BOARD_RPY_SEQ AS saleBoardRpySeq FROM CLT_ORD_DTL DTL INNER JOIN CLT_ORD_BASE BASE ON BASE.ORDR_ID = DTL.RGST_ID AND BASE.ORD_CLM_NO = DTL.ORD_CLM_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_STD_CD_BASE STD ON DTL.ORD_DTL_STAT_CD = STD.CODE_VAL LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_SALE_BOARD SALE ON DTL.GOODS_CD = SALE.GOODS_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_GOODS_INFO GOOD ON DTL.GOODS_CD = GOOD.GOODS_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_SALE_BOARD_RVW RVW ON BASE.ORD_NO = RVW.ORD_NO WHERE 1=1 AND STD.GRP_CD = 'STD004' AND BASE.ORD_CLM_NO = #{ordClmNo}
/* cltOrderMapper - searchOrdDtlGoods */ SELECT GOODS_NM AS goodsNm , GOODS_CD AS goodsCd , GOODS_QTY AS goodsQty FROM CLT_ORD_DTL WHERE 1=1 AND RGST_ID = #{usrId}
